item.description:
The Helmand is unique in Boston. The cusisine is Afghani (which resembles Pakistani) and delicious. Menu is diverse. The prices are ridiculously low, $12-19 for entrees. Ambience is appealing.

If you must cancel, be sure to do so by internet at least twelve hours in advance, or else by phone (781)643-0130. Please don't be a no-show as there are consequences, and not just to your kharma.

Closest T stop is Lechmere (Green Line). Parking takes a little hunting. The abandoned mini-lot immediately across the side street is fair game (I've used it many times).

- Harold
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for the Meetup group.
